name: n8n-nodes-base.googleFirebaseCloudFirestoreTool
semantic_context: Interact with Google Firebase - Cloud Firestore API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Interact with Google Firebase - Cloud Firestore API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: As displayed in firebase console URL. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.ai_hint: As displayed in firebase console URL. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

database.name: database
database.description: Usually the provided default value will work
database.ai_hint: Usually the provided default value will work

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Name of the field in an input item that contains the document ID
updateKey.ai_hint: Name of the field in an input item that contains the document ID

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'collection'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'collection'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'collection'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'collection'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'collection'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateKey'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'columns'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF resource == 'document' AND operation == 'query' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'query' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'collection' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'database'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'collection' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
